entities.description: Categorical responses indicating the frequency of event occurrence.
The raw number of occurrences for each response category.
The percentage of occurrences for each response category.
Descriptive statistics summarizing the survey data including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Data points that are not recorded or are absent from the dataset.
Type of data, indicating if the variable is numeric.
Range of values representing the missing data in the dataset.
Specifies the location (columns) of the data within the dataset.

relationships.description: The survey includes various response categories indicating the frequency of event occurrence.
Each response category is associated with a raw number of occurrences.
Each response category has a corresponding percentage of occurrences.
The survey is summarized by descriptive statistics including mean, median, mode, minimum, maximum, and standard deviation.
Indicates the presence of missing data points in the dataset.
The survey data includes variables indicated by their type, such as numeric.
The missing data points are represented by a range of values.
Specifies the columns where data is stored in the dataset.
